revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Tower of Waters |image = [[File:Tower of Waters.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Tower of Waters. |tokens = 2,000,000 |location = North of Challenge Beach }}
<!--T:2--> '''Tower of Waters''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 28,886,112 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=4| <center>N/A || [[File:Master Dojo Student.png|40px]] Master Dojo Student || [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Master Dojo Student.png|40px]] Master Dojo Student || [[File:Krabby.png|40px]] Krabby |- | [[File:Master Dojo Student.png|40px]] Master Dojo Student || [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill |- | [[File:Master Dojo Student.png|40px]] Master Dojo Student || [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2| <center>N/A || [[File:Dojo Master.png|40px]] Master Dojo Mustard || [[File:Kubfu.png|40px]] Kubfu || <center> 144,430,560 |}
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 4.05% || 5.30% || 10.53% |}
<!--T:9--> {{Galar Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #8 - Galar^a]] </translate>

It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encount..."
